title: Introduction
body: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Self-Improvement audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Stress & Anxiety audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.

title: Confidence
body:
This audio hypnotherapy session will help you think confidently, talk confidently and act confidently.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Not only does being confident feel good, it helps you to seize opportunities, take more chances, make changes or take the next step in your life or even your career. This audio hypnotherapy session will help you think confidently, talk confidently and act confidently. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you feel more and more confident.
teaser: This audio hypnotherapy session will help you think confidently, talk confidently and act confidently.

title: Happier
body: While some factors that affect happiness are out of our control, there are always actions we can take to increase our happiness. One is by starting to be good to yourself. That may sound self-evident, but too many people try to achieve happiness by either making other people happy or by chasing ever-higher goals or holding themselves to ever-greater standards of perfection. In this audio hypnotherapy session we will help you to be good to yourself, achieve your goals and in turn bring yourself more self-confidence and happiness. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to feeling and being more happy.
teaser: In this audio hypnotherapy session, we will help you to be good to yourself, achieve your goals and in turn bring yourself more self-confidence and happiness.

title: Having More Patience
body: Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Patience is essential to daily life and might be the key to a happy one.  Having patience means being able to wait calmly in the face of frustration or adversity.  Whether you feel like you could be more patient at work, at  home or in your social life, patience can make the difference between annoyance and equanimity, between worry and tranquility. This audio hypnotherapy session will help you to retrain your mind to let go of impatience, to remain calm and to release the tension and impatience that you may have been experiencing. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to being more patient.
teaser: This audio hypnotherapy session will help you to retrain your mind to let go of impatience, to remain calm and to release the tension and impatience that you may have been experiencing.

title: Insecurity
body: Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Maybe for some time, you’ve been experiencing feelings that have made you feel insecure about yourself, less fulfilled than you know you should be, and it’s impacted the way you behave and look at life. This audio hypnotherapy session will help you put aside negative thoughts and feelings and help you to accept yourself for the unique individual that you are. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to feeling more confident and secure.
teaser: This audio hypnotherapy session will help you put aside negative thoughts and feelings and help you to accept yourself for the unique individual that you are.

title: Kindness to Others
body: Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Being kind to others brings so many health benefits but being kind to yourself is even more important. This audio hypnotherapy session will help you to change your thinking patterns so that you are motivated and interested in being kind to others but most importantly to yourself. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to being kinder to yourself and others.
teaser: This audio hypnotherapy session will help you to change your thinking patterns so that you are motivated and interested in being kind to others but most importantly to yourself.

title: Self-Esteem
body: Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Self-esteem refers to a person’s beliefs about their own worth and value. If you feel like you may need help working on your self esteem, you most likely have a diminished sense of worthiness or unworthiness. Self-esteem is important because it heavily influences your choices and decisions. This audio hypnotherapy session will help you find a new self-confidence,  be more assertive, feel more self assured and increase your self worth. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you improve your self-esteem.
teaser: This audio hypnotherapy session will help you find a new self-confidence,  be more assertive, feel more self assured and increase your self worth.

title: Accepting Yourself
body: Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Always seeking to be the best at what you do or having to prove yourself to others can be exhausting and leave you feeling worried and unfulfilled. In this audio hypnotherapy session we will help you  acknowledge that there might be many things you’d change about yourself if you could, but the one thing that you are in control of and the one thing we want to start with is unconditional self love.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you accept yourself flaws and all.
teaser: In this audio hypnotherapy session we will help you  acknowledge that there might be many things you’d change about yourself if you could, but the one thing that you are in control of and the one thing we want to start with is unconditional self love.
